    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10469030">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10469030">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10469030">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10463276">
          <div id="boxatt10463276" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12725463">
              <a id="link_12725463" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ammusic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725463,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725463});">
               American Music
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link13960560">
              <a id="link_13960560" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/globalpop" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13960560,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13960560});">
               Global Pop
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725472">
              <a id="link_12725472" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistoryone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725472,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725472});">
               Music History I
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725482">
              <a id="link_12725482" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistorytwo" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725482});">
               Music History II
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link21847546">
              <a id="link_21847546" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/danube" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21847546,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21847546});">
               Music of Blue Danube
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10463284">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10463284">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10463284">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10463284">
          <div id="boxatt10463284" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12717597">
              <a id="link_12717597" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717597,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717597}); ">
               Early English Books Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Digital facsimile page images of virtually every work printed in England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and British North America and works in English printed elsewhere from 1473-1700.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717598">
              <a id="link_12717598" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717598,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717598}); ">
               Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 180,000 titles (200,000 volumes) comprising books, pamphlets, essays, broadsides and more based on the English Short Title Catalogue Works published in the UK during the 18th century plus thousands from elsewhere. Content covers critical information in the fields of history, literature, religion, law, fine arts, science and more. Primarily in English but also includes other languages.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link17562612">
              <a id="link_17562612" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/shmu" target="_blank" onclick="hit(17562612,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17562612}); ">
               Music Online: Classical Scores Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The collection includes works from the Renaissance to the 21st century. Coverage of score types is comprehensive, with full scores, study scores, piano and vocal scores, and piano reductions. Provides for textual searching by various criteria, including composers, genres, instruments, and time periods.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20911648">
              <a id="link_20911648" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/opiv" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20911648,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20911648}); ">
               Music Online: Opera in Video
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Several hundred hours of the most important opera performances, captured on video through staged productions, interviews, and documentaries. Selections represent the world’s best performers, conductors, and opera houses and are based on a work’s importance to the operatic canon.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link17562718">
              <a id="link_17562718" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.NaxosMusicLibrary.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(17562718,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17562718}); ">
               Naxos Music Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Naxos Music Library is the most comprehensive collection of classical music available online offering over 1,252,200 tracks* of Classical music, Jazz, World, Folk and Chinese music. It includes the complete BIS, Chandos, Hänssler, Hungaroton, Marco Polo, Naxos, Ondine and selected titles of other leading independent labels. Here is a
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/music/Naxos.pdf">
                guide
               </a>
               to using Naxos.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725967">
              <a id="link_12725967" href="http://imslp.org/wiki/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725967,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725967}); ">
               Petrucci Music Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free website containing thousands of "public domain" music scores, compiled by the International Music Score Library Project (IMSLP).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon

        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
